title: Birthday with a rioter!

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: So i sent an email to riot support about maybe getting to play a game with a rioter for my Birthday. I was told to post a message to the boards in hopes of playing one!. I have been a nonstop player for about a year now and playing with a rioter would be amazing!{{champion:15}}

replies.body:
Hiya Chosen of Nissa! 

I'd be happy to play with you on your birthday! Let's pick a date/time and I'll mark it on my calendar.
Thank you! That makes me very happy. How about Tuesday at about 3pm Central time? If that doesnt work im usually free in the evenings since my college classes are in the morning.
Sounds good to me, I've got it marked on my calendar. :] I'll shoot you an invite!

Quick! Its my birthday too! Got 3 hours left for this special occasion!
I guess your birthday is the 25th!
Hey man happy birthday! :) enjoy your game!
